short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download lots of Instagram pictures and videos all at once, download IG stories, and save  any IG media you want!
short.zh_CN: 批量下载Instagram图片视频，下载快拍，保存任何IG图片和视频

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features
- Batch Download - Batch Save Instagram Posts Content.
- Profile Image Download - Download Instagram Profile Photo
- Save Instagram Photo - Download high quality pictures that you like
- IGTV、Reels Download- Download origin video to your PC or Mac
- Download Story - 0ne-by-one or all of them at once
- Download Highlights - Download pictures and videos from the Highlights

How to use：
- Install this extension
- Log in to Instagram from the web and choose pictures or videos that you like
- Click the download button and choose where you want to save the file
long.zh_CN:
插件特点：
- 批量下载 - 批量保存ins博主帖子内容
- 头像下载 - 支持保存Instagram用户头像
- 帖子解析 - 提供帖子单图或多图下载功能
- IGTV、Reels 短视频储存 - 实现Instagram原视频储存功能
- 捕捉快拍限时动态 - 批量下载快拍中的图片视频
- 保存快拍精选合集 - 快拍精选一键打包下载

使用教程：
- 安装ins存图鸭批量下载插件
- 打开Instagram网页版，挑选需要下载的图片或视频
- 将鼠标移至需要保存的照片或视频，点击下载图标即可将所选内容打包下载至你的电脑
